item.LongText:
The Beko GentleCare 20°™ program washes the cottons you love more gently, helping to protect their texture and colour, and to prolong their life. It also uses just half the energy of a 40°C wash*. Double bonus.
*Tested by 3rd party laboratories.
item.Text: Official partner of… in-love-with-their-clothes types

item.LongText: You’ve sieved, you’ve beaten and you’ve mixed. Of course you want to watch your creation rise to perfection. That’s why we’ve added new halogen lights to the left corner of our ovens, so you can see your masterpiece with ease. After all, the first bite is with the eyes.

You’ve sieved, you’ve beaten and you’ve mixed. Of course you want to watch your creation rise to perfection. That’s why we’ve added new halogen lights to the left corner of our ovens, so you can see your masterpiece with ease. After all, the first bite is with the eyes.

item.Text: This special program has less mechanical movements and the temperature is set maximum at 40 ºC to ensure that it minimizes the damage to your shirts and they last much longer than they usually would.

item.LongText:
Can’t wait to wear that brand new garment? Of course you don’t want to be wearing it straight from the shop because who knows how many other people have tried it on before you – eww. It needs a quick run through the washing machine to make sure it’s really clean before you wear it. Luckily, you’ve got the Xpress Super Short 14-minute cycle* on your Beko washing machine, so you won’t have to wait long. Your outfit will be washed and ready by the time you make plans to show the world your new fabulous look.
*For 2kg of lightly soiled garments

Grocery shopping, check. Cleaning the refrigerator, check. Fixing the dripping tap, check. Washing a whole load of laundry in less than half an hour, check. That’s right, Beko’s Daily Express can wash a full load of laundry in just 28 minutes at 30 °C. With a program this fast, you can get back to your long to-do list in no time. Look at you, all organized and productive!

Sorting the laundry into piles of different kinds of fabric? That’s just too much work. What if there was a washing machine to take that load off your hands? Well, there is. Beko’s AutoProgram and smart sensors will automatically work out what type of fabric you’ve put in, how many garments there are and choose the right washing program for you. Cottons, synthetics, blended - all done. Washing your clothes really can be that easy.

You’re only human. So, yes, sometimes you might get distracted by the doorbell, phone, or that must-see TV cliffhanger. But never fear. Should the wind come and blow your gas flames out, or if your pan boils over while you’re under the spell of a gripping storyline, Beko’s gas safety feature will automatically turn off your gas supply, keeping you safe. No leaks, no worries.

Beko EcoGentle™ technology means you can get clothes dry without colours fading or draining your bank account. With an A+++ -10% energy rating it saves you 73% energy compared with C-rated vented or condenser machines*. Drying at a lower temperature (60°C with EcoGentle™ heat pump instead of 110°C with an AV condenser) is gentler on your clothes too. If your clothes could talk, we’re sure they’d thank you for it.
*WD factory test results
item.Text: Official partner of… colourful outlooks

item.LongText: OptiSense® technology in your Beko tumble dryer optimises the drying cycle, so you don’t need to guess how long your clothes will take to dry. 3 smart sensors let you choose how dry you want your clothes and stop the dryer when that level of dryness is achieved. Damp or dry, your wish is our command.
item.Text: Official partner of… I choose how dry I want my clothes

item.LongText: Try as you might, you can’t get the dog off the sofa or the cat off the bed. It’s that look they give you when you try and shove them off. You know what that means - lots of pet hair on your bedding, your best trousers, your meeting outfit… everywhere. The Pet Hair Removal Function on your Beko washing machine can take care of that. It has a pre-wash cycle, a special extra rinsing program and improved spinning cycles to help get rid of all the stubborn pet hair on your laundry. If your pets do as they please, at least you’ll have a washing machine that listens to you.

Beko Intensive Ventilation is more efficient than the average cooker hood, with a booster setting that’s 67%* more powerful than the maximum setting. It’ll totally refresh the air inside an average kitchen in about the time it takes you to demolish your steak.
*Tested by internal laboratories
item.Text: Official partner of… special steak dinners

item.LongText: Getting rid of lingering food odours can be a fishy business. With Beko Air Cleaning Mode technology, your cooker hood will automatically switch on for 10 minutes every hour at the minimum speed needed, so you can quietly get rid of kitchen odours using the minimum amount of energy.
item.Text: Official partner of… fishy business

item.LongText: Some people are wizards in the kitchen. Or so they think when they use their Beko Remote Controller to control the speed of their cooker hood, and to turn the light on and off. Abracadabra!

item.Text: The sensor-controlled Beko tumble dryers feature a special care program for your delicate laundry, ensuring that they’ll be dried gently at very low temperature.
The freshen-up program allows you to get rid of unwanted odors in your laundry with a gentle drum action ensures that your laundry is freshened-up without having to be washed.
This program dries laundry at an optimized humidity level that is perfectly adjusted for sports clothing.
This program dries laundry at an optimized humidity level that is perfectly adjusted for sports clothing.
Drying shirts in a normal drying cycle can damage the shirt and cause loss of brightness in whites over time.

Beko have developed a Daily program to dry 4 kg of laundry in just 1 hour. Used in conjunction with a Beko washing machine with a Daily program, you can wash and dry your clothes in less than 2 hours.

item.LongText: Microwaves are quick, but the food coming out of them often tastes as flavourless as the cardboard it came wrapped in. Luckily Beko’s clever TalentChef™ technology can be set to work like a microwave, a traditional oven or a combination of the two. A veritable cooking multitasker! The combination of 600w microwave power and 1800w conventional heating saves you up to 50% cooking time and energy, and takes up less space in your kitchen too. Plus, your food will still taste divine - and that’s all that matters, after all.

If you’re the type of person who likes to do a regular big shop, and then worry about storing all that food properly, you can relax with Beko’s MultiZone® compartment. It lets you flex the temperature between -24°C and +10°C* to chill, soft freeze or freeze whatever you’ve filled your bags with this week. Brilliant.
* Tested by internal labs
item.Text: Official partner of… compulsive cart fillers

item.LongText:
If you’re the type of person who likes to do a regular big shop, and then worry about storing all that food properly, you can relax with Beko’s MultiZone® compartment. It lets you flex the temperature between -24°C and +10°C* to chill, soft freeze or freeze whatever you’ve filled your bags with this week. Brilliant.
* Tested by internal labs
item.Text: Official partner of… compulsive cart fillers

item.LongText: When your fridge is full, it’s easy to forget about those tasty ingredients hiding away in the deep, dark depths. Beko’s efficient LED Lighting runs along your refrigerator’s ceiling and sides, illuminating every shelf separately and lighting the way to your next culinary creation. Now, nothing will go to waste.

When your fridge is full, it’s easy to forget about those tasty ingredients hiding away in the deep, dark depths. Beko’s efficient LED Lighting runs along your refrigerator’s ceiling and sides, illuminating every shelf separately and lighting the way to your next culinary creation. Now, nothing will go to waste.

Health freaks will be happy to know that Beko Active Fresh Blue Light™ technology protects vitamin C intensity and the flavour of your fruits and vegetables. The Active Fresh Blue Light™ in your crisper helps your fruits and veggies continue photosynthesizing, which means they’re up to 30%* better preserved. More time to feel smug.
* Tested by FRPERC and TÜBİTAK (compared with standard crispers for tomatoes, and red and green peppers)
item.Text: Official partner of Fresh Foods

item.LongText:
Health freaks will be happy to know that Beko Active Fresh Blue Light™ technology protects vitamin C intensity and the flavour of your fruits and vegetables. The Active Fresh Blue Light™ in your crisper helps your fruits and veggies continue photosynthesizing, which means they’re up to 30%* better preserved. More time to feel smug.
* Tested by FRPERC and TÜBİTAK (compared with standard crispers for tomatoes, and red and green peppers)
item.Text: Official partner of Fresh Foods

item.LongText: Doing the shopping is bad enough, and then you’ve got to organise everything to get it all in the refrigerator. Yawn... Beko’s TouchLift is a shelf with a difference. Perfect for lazy unloaders, pressing a button automatically adjusts the height to create the space you need and help even the tallest or unusually shaped items slide in effortlessly.

item.Text: The Active Ioniser neutralises bacteria, viruses and particles that cause effluvia in the refrigerator, thus creating an antibacterial effect.
The Active Ioniser neutralises bacteria, viruses and particles that cause effluvia in the refrigerator, thus creating an antibacterial effect.

item.LongText:
If you’re the type of person who likes to cook at home and are always after the freshest and most organic ingredients, then Beko’s EverFresh+® technology is just for you. Thanks to EverFresh+®, your fresh fruits and veggies will stay crisp and tasty for up to 30 days*, so that you can have a month’s worth of ingredients for healthy home-made food!
*Tested by SGS (compared with standard crispers for broccoli and lettuce)
item.Text: Official partner of…. fresh ingredients

item.LongText:
If you’re the type of person who likes to cook at home and are always after the freshest and most organic ingredients, then Beko’s EverFresh+® technology is just for you. Thanks to EverFresh+®, your fresh fruits and veggies will stay crisp and tasty for up to 30 days*, so that you can have a month’s worth of ingredients for healthy home-made food!
*Tested by SGS (compared with standard crispers for broccoli and lettuce)
item.Text: Official partner of…. fresh ingredients

item.LongText: Throwing your favourite shirt in the tumble dryer is always a tough choice. Thanks to Beko’s AquaWave® technology, there’s no need to worry. Aided by a set of paddles and a specially designed drum pattern, a wave-like motion is created to gently move your laundry inside the machine, giving garments more exposure and increasing drying performance making sure your favourite shirt will last for many days to come.
item.Text: Official partner of… favourite shirts

item.LongText:
With a demanding job and a long commute, who’s got time to iron? If you feel like there’s never enough time in the day, then you’ll love the SteamTherapy™ technology in Beko washing machines, which can reduce wrinkles in your laundry by up to 58%* decreasing ironing time by up to 28%*. It helps decrease odours too. Now you don’t have to waste time ironing in the morning - use it to grab a coffee instead.
* Tested by 3rd party laboratories
item.Text: Official partner of… no time to iron

item.LongText: You and your favourite shirt have been through a lot together, and throwing it in the washing machine is always a tough choice. With Beko AquaWave® technology, there’s no need to worry. Aided by a set of paddles and a specially designed drum pattern, a wave-like motion is created to gently move your laundry inside the machine, giving garments more exposure and increasing drying performance. You’ll save on energy too. You and your favourite shirt will have a lot more nights-out to come.

If you’ve ever entertained a big crowd, then you know that waiting around for glasses and dishes to clean is out of the question. You certainly don’t want to keep your guests waiting for the second round of drinks and appetizers. The Fast+ Function in your Beko dishwasher gives you a cleaning performance which is an amazing 3 times faster*. It can save you up to 70%* of your valuable time and get your dishes sparkling clean too. All the more time to spend making sparkling conversation with your guests.
*Tested by internal laboratories

If you’re environmentally conscious but still want a quieter dishwasher, we can’t argue with you there. However, we can offer ProSmart™ Inverter Motor technology, which is not only 2 times quieter* than most (thanks to a frictionless motor), it also helps to save water and energy. With almost no waste, it offers a rating of A+++ (- 10%)*, by using only what’s necessary. That’s a load off your mind.
*Tested by internal laboratories

Your Beko dishwasher may be so quiet you might not know whether it’s on or not. Has it finished cleaning the dishes yet? Yes, or no? There’s no time to waste wondering and checking. That’s where the Beko LEDSpot™ on your dishwasher can help. A red light indicator on the floor at the base of the machine means you can tell with just one quick look whether it’s running or not. So you can let the dishwasher get quietly on with its job and you can get hurriedly on with yours.

You’re an expert refrigerator packer - everything has its place. But what’s this? A big bottle of juice you know was a thrifty buy, but just won’t fit in the door rack? Luckily Beko FlexiLift™ can give you up to another 80mm of room simply by pushing buttons on each side of the rack. The shelf can then be easily lifted and moved to the perfect position, making space for that troublesome bottle. Simple.

With Beko Split & Cook® technology, a separator gives you three ovens in one. Vegans who love carnivores can happily cook two different meals at the same time, with no mixing of flavours and no falling out. It’s possible to have a temperature difference of up to 80⁰C between the top and bottom ovens, which can come in very handy. Especially at keeping loving relationships loving. Phew.
item.Text: Official partner of… vegans who love carnivores

item.LongText:
Don’t you just hate the sight of all those dirty dishes stacked on top of each other in the sink? You’ll have to scrub them too. Yuck! Beko AquaIntense® is here to save the day. With a special ‘Intensive zone’ on the right hand side of the machine, a 180° rotating arm and a 360° water coverage, AquaIntense® ensures 5-times-better cleaning performance*. Throw away your rubber gloves and leave the washing to us.
* Tested by DW factory with Intensive 70 programs
item.Text: Official partner of… handwashing haters

item.LongText:
If you find yourself in a race to finish all the fresh fruits and vegetables in your refrigerator before they go off, you and your food can chill with Beko NeoFrost™. The two separate cooling systems between the refrigerator and the freezer compartments, along with a balanced air circulation system, maintain high humidity and retain moisture for longer. Coupled with 2-times-faster* cooling, this prevents odour transfer between compartments. Now you can enjoy your food at your own pace.
* Tested by internal labs
item.Text: Official partner of … food lovers

item.LongText: A single wash may not seem like it consumes much energy, but things add up over time, especially if your appliance comes with a 10 year warranty like Beko’s ProSmart™ Inverter washing machines. You’ll be happy to know that Beko ProSmart™ Inverter motor technology also offers energy efficiency of up to A+++ -70%*, keeping the electricity bills down. They keep the noise down too. Thanks to a variable, frictionless motor spin, your washing won’t disturb anyone.
item.Text: Official partner of… energy saving fans

item.LongText: A single wash may not seem like it consumes much energy, but things add up over time, especially if your appliance comes with a 10 year warranty like Beko’s ProSmart™ Inverter washing machines. You’ll be happy to know that Beko ProSmart™ Inverter motor technology also offers energy efficiency of up to A+++ -70%*, keeping the electricity bills down. They keep the noise down too. Thanks to a variable, frictionless motor spin, your washing won’t disturb anyone.
item.Text: Official partner of… energy saving fans

item.LongText: A single wash may not seem like it consumes much energy, but things add up over time, especially if your appliance comes with a 10 year warranty like Beko’s ProSmart™ Inverter washing machines. You’ll be happy to know that Beko ProSmart™ Inverter motor technology also offers energy efficiency of up to A+++ -70%*, keeping the electricity bills down. They keep the noise down too. Thanks to a variable, frictionless motor spin, your washing won’t disturb anyone.
item.Text: Official partner of… energy saving fans

item.LongText: A single wash may not seem like it consumes much energy, but things add up over time, especially if your appliance comes with a 10 year warranty like Beko’s ProSmart™ Inverter washing machines. They keep the noise down too. Thanks to a variable, frictionless motor spin, your washing won’t disturb anyone.
item.Text: Official partner of… energy saving fans

item.LongText: A single wash may not seem like it consumes much energy, but things add up over time, especially if your appliance comes with a 10 year warranty like Beko’s ProSmart™ Inverter washing machines. They keep the noise down too. Thanks to a variable, frictionless motor spin, your washing won’t disturb anyone.
item.Text: Official partner of… energy saving fans

item.LongText:
What do you want for lunch? If you’re one of those always-in-and-out of-the-fridge types, it will help save on your energy bill if your fridge has a Beko ProSmart™ Inverter Compressor. That way you can open the door for a good nose inside as many times as you like and the clever ProSmart™ technology will adapt and create fewer temperature variations, cooling your food quickly and cleverly saving energy and money. On top of all that, the ProSmart™ Inverter Compressor is four times quieter than the compressor in your average fridge*.
* Tested by internal labs

When the party’s getting hot, you need to keep your guests cool. A refreshing round of drinks should do the trick, all with generous servings of ice. Beko’s Turbo Ice Maker means your refrigerator will keep the ice coming, up to 5kg a day*! With 2 fans working in parallel, you can just chill. Cheers!
* Tested by internal labs

You want a water dispenser but don’t want to sacrifice the space in your refrigerator? You’re in luck because there’s the Beko SlimTank™, a slimline dispenser which sits inside your refrigerator door without taking up an inch of space inside. Now you can squeeze in an extra couple of bottles while still being just a button away from a perfectly chilled glass of water.

If you want to get ahead in life, you need the right tools. Beko’s clever Booster button, lets you heat up your cooking zone to the maximum temperature instantly so that food cooks quicker. Thanks to Booster, you’ll have the time and energy to get back to more important things.
item.Text: Official partner of… getting ahead in life

item.LongText: The Beko IndyFlex+™ Hob lets you configure your hob to fit the number and size of pans you’re cooking with. You can configure 8 independent zones to fit 2 big pans or 8 small pans. Using the right sized hob makes your food cook quicker too – all the better for pleasing the home crowd.
item.Text: Official partner of… use-every-pan cooks

item.LongText: Coffee lovers don’t want their precious coffee pots wobbling on the hob and spilling. Beko cast iron supports add stability to your hob and a certain style too. Extra perks for the extraordinarily hip.
item.Text: Official partner of… coffee lovers

item.LongText:
We all love a clean, simple bathroom design - free of clutter and a feeling of space. Volumaxx™ means you get more space in your bathroom, thanks to a slimmer machine with an expanded drum. It’s 10% smaller but doesn’t compromise on the machine’s capacity. It’s available on machines with capacities of 8kg and over, so there’s still plenty of room for all those socks and shirts. It uses less energy overall too – 10% more, or less (oh, you know what we mean). Either way it’s a world-first.
*Compared with standard-size 8-11 kg Beko washing machines

We all love a clean, simple bathroom design - free of clutter and a feeling of space. Volumaxx™ means you get more space in your bathroom, thanks to a slimmer machine with an expanded drum. It’s 10% smaller but doesn’t compromise on the machine’s capacity. It’s available on machines with capacities of 8kg and over, so there’s still plenty of room for all those socks and shirts. It uses less energy overall too – 10% more, or less (oh, you know what we mean). Either way it’s a world-first.
*Compared with standard-size 8-11 kg Beko washing machines

A new-born can mean a lot of work - feeding, burping, changing nappies. At least cleaning their bottles and pacifiers won’t be hard work with BabyProtect+® technology. Beko BabyProtect+® has a special program that includes antibacterial settings and special accessories to take care of your baby’s health along with the rest of the dishes. It means you can be assured of 99.9999% hygiene*. There’s also an antibacterial seal, an additional rinsing step, and a final hot 70°C rinsing cycle that’s perfect for baby bottles. Plus, there’s even a special baby bottle holder in the lower basket. Awww.
*Tested by TRLP (TUEV Rheinland LGA Products GmbH)

You and your favourite shirt have been through a lot together, and throwing it in the washing machine is always a tough choice. With Beko AquaWave® technology, there’s no need to worry. A specially designed drum pattern, with the help of paddles, gently moves your laundry in a wave-like drum action so your clothes move smoothly around in the drum. AquaWave® glass in the door is curved too, moving the clothes more easily and giving a better mixing effect while increasing washing performance. You’ll save on energy too. You and your favourite shirt will have a lot more nights-out to come.

That’s funny. You don’t remember putting your 7-year-old niece’s wool sweater in the washing machine. Ooh, it’s your sweater, shrunk beyond recognition. We know what that feels like. Luckily Beko washing machines carry the WoolMark® Handwash Safe Care certificate for their wool program, so can look after all your woollens with the respect they deserve. Powered by ProSmart™ Inverter technology, Beko washing machines also carry WoolMark® Apparel care certification, and will wash even your most delicate hand-wash woollens with ultimate care. Let that poor sweater be the last one you give away.

Grocery shopping, check. Cleaning the refrigerator, check. Fixing the dripping tap, check. Washing a whole load of laundry in less than half an hour, check. That’s right, Beko’s Daily Express can wash a full load of laundry in just 28 minutes at 30 °C. With a program this fast, you can get back to your long to-do list in no time. Look at you, all organized and productive!

Can’t wait to wear that brand new garment? Of course you don’t want to be wearing it straight from the shop because who knows how many other people have tried it on before you – eww. It needs a quick run through the washing machine to make sure it’s really clean before you wear it. Luckily, you’ve got the Xpress Super Short 14-minute cycle* on your Beko washing machine, so you won’t have to wait long. Your outfit will be washed and ready by the time you make plans to show the world your new fabulous look.
*For 2 kg lightly soiled garments

A last minute meeting, date or get-together… You want to look your best but you’ve got nothing clean left. Thanks to Beko’s Wash&Wear® technology, you can choose from temperature settings of 20°- 30°C and get up to 1 kg (5 shirts) washed and completely dried in less than an hour. You jump in the shower, your lucky shirt goes in the wash and voila! You’re ready to go.
item.Text: Official partner of… last-minute-date types

item.LongText:
Can’t wait to wear that brand new garment? Of course you don’t want to be wearing it straight from the shop because who knows how many other people have tried it on before you – eww. It needs a quick run through the washing machine to make sure it’s really clean before you wear it. Luckily, you’ve got the Xpress Super Short 14-minute cycle* on your Beko washing machine, so you won’t have to wait long. Your outfit will be washed and ready by the time you make plans to show the world your new fabulous look.
*For 2kg of lightly soiled garments

If your family tree looks more like a forest, get-togethers can start to get a bit complicated. With Beko CookMaster®, the more the merrier. The 82-litre capacity means you can get up to 5 shelves cooking perfectly evenly at the same time, so you’ll have more time to plan who sits next to who.
item.Text: Official partner of… extended families
Quick & Clean, a unique program from Beko, guarantees exceptional A class washing performance, not only for lightly soiled items, but for normally soiled pots and dishes as well.

item.LongText: That’s funny. You don’t remember putting your 7-year-old niece’s wool sweater in the washing machine. Ooh, it’s your sweater, shrunk beyond recognition. We know what that feels like. Luckily Beko washing machines carry the WoolMark® Handwash Safe Care certificate for their wool program, so can look after all your woollens with the respect they deserve. Powered by ProSmart™ Inverter technology, Beko washing machines also carry WoolMark® Apparel care certification, and will wash even your most delicate hand-wash woollens with ultimate care. Let that poor sweater be the last one you give away.

Stop junior chefs with little curious fingers from getting into trouble in the kitchen with the Easy Lock Function from Beko. This feature shuts down all the hobs at once and functions as an effective child lock, so wandering fingers don’t get hurt.
item.Text: Official partner of… curious little helpers

item.LongText: Beko Clean Zone™’s revolutionary oleophobic coating technology on glass oven doors resists dirt and grime, the way you resist the idea of scrubbing. Its excellent easy-clean features mean you don’t need to use heavy duty products or spend valuable time and effort cleaning. Go ahead, roast that juicy chicken without fear!
item.Text: Official partner of… the deliciously messy

item.LongText:
Short copy If you’re the type of cook who wants to impress with every creation, Beko Surf® technology promises the high performance cooking your masterpieces deserve. Uniform hot air circulation cooks your finest dishes to perfection, not to mention up to 30% faster*, even if you’re cooking on multiple shelves to please your audience.
*Tested by internal laboratories
item.Text: Official partner of… cooks who want to impress
